sections.heading: 〜続ける (tsuzukeru) - Continue
sections.content:
〜続ける attaches to verb stems to indicate continuing an action over time . It emphasizes persistence, duration, and sustained effort.

Verb stem + 続ける 走り続ける - keep running 勉強し続ける - continue studying 待ち続ける - keep waiting Ongoing action Sustained effort Persistence emphasized

children.heading: Basic pattern
children.content: る-verbs: 食べる → 食べ続ける "continue eating" 見る → 見続ける "continue watching" 寝る → 寝続ける "continue sleeping" う-verbs: 走る → 走り続ける "keep running" 書く → 書き続ける "keep writing" 待つ → 待ち続ける "keep waiting" 話す → 話し続ける "keep talking" Irregular: する → し続ける "continue doing" 来る → 来続ける "keep coming"

children.heading: Ongoing persistence
children.content: 10年間勉強し続けた "Continued studying for 10 years" Emphasis on duration Sustained effort Not stopping 雨が降り続けている "Rain keeps falling" Continuous action Still ongoing No end yet

children.heading: Long-term continuity
children.content: 毎日走り続けている "Continue running every day" 3時間待ち続けた "Kept waiting for 3 hours" ずっと考え続けている "Keep thinking about it constantly" Duration emphasized Persistence shown Effort sustained

children.heading: Despite difficulties
children.content: 諦めずに挑戦し続ける "Continue challenging without giving up" 困難でも働き続けた "Kept working despite difficulties" Often implies overcoming obstacles Determination shown Persistence valued

children.heading: Maintains verb pattern
children.content: Transitive stays transitive: 本を読み続ける "continue reading a book" 仕事をし続ける "continue doing work" Intransitive stays intransitive: 雨が降り続ける "rain continues falling" 時間が過ぎ続ける "time keeps passing" Original grammar preserved

children.heading: With time periods
children.content: 3時間走り続けた "Kept running for 3 hours" 10年間勉強し続けた "Continued studying for 10 years" 一晩中考え続けた "Kept thinking all night" Works naturally with duration Emphasizes length of time

children.heading: Indefinite continuation
children.content: ずっと待ち続ける "Keep waiting forever" いつまでも愛し続ける "Continue loving forever" 永遠に続く "Continue eternally" Open-ended duration No specified end

children.heading: Current ongoing state
children.content: 今も勉強し続けている "Still continuing to study even now" 雨が降り続けている "Rain is continuing to fall" Present progressive Action still happening Ongoing state

children.heading: 続ける vs ている
children.content: 走っている "Is running" (current action) 走り続けている "Keeps running / continues running" (Emphasis on persistence/duration) 続ける adds persistence nuance More than just ongoing Sustained effort implied

children.heading: Often implies effort
children.content: 頑張り続ける "Keep trying hard" 信じ続ける "Keep believing" 愛し続ける "Keep loving" Positive persistence Determination Emotional strength

children.heading: Persistence and determination
children.content: 夢を追い続ける "Continue pursuing dreams" 練習し続ける "Continue practicing" 努力し続ける "Continue making efforts" Goal-oriented Long-term commitment

children.heading: Natural phenomena
children.content: 雨が降り続ける "Rain continues falling" 太陽が照り続ける "Sun keeps shining" 風が吹き続ける "Wind keeps blowing" Weather and nature Ongoing processes

children.heading: Waiting and hoping
children.content: 待ち続ける "Keep waiting" 期待し続ける "Continue hoping" 信じ続ける "Keep believing" Emotional endurance Faith and patience

children.heading: Stop continuing
children.content: 続けられない "Can't continue" もう走り続けられない "Can't keep running anymore" Inability to persist Reached limit

children.heading: Didn't continue
children.content: 勉強し続けなかった "Didn't continue studying" 諦めて、待ち続けなかった "Gave up and didn't keep waiting" Ceased action Discontinued

children.heading: Combined patterns
children.content: 走り続けてきた "Have been continuing to run" 信じ続けていく "Will continue to believe (into future)" 頑張り続けなければならない "Must continue trying hard" Versatile combinations Natural with various grammar

children.heading: Neutral across contexts
children.content: Can use in: - Casual: 走り続けた - Polite: 走り続けました - Written: 走り続けた Adjust with conjugation Not inherently formal/casual

children.heading: Regular る-verb
children.content: 続ける is a る-verb: Present: 続ける Past: 続けた Negative: 続けない Te-form: 続けて Potential: 続けられる Passive: 続けられる Volitional: 続けよう Standard conjugations

children.heading: Implies challenge
children.content: Often used when action is difficult: 痛みに耐えながら走り続けた "Kept running while enduring pain" 疲れても働き続けた "Kept working even when tired" Continuation despite hardship Admirable persistence

children.heading: Motivational language
children.content: 諦めずに続けよう "Let's continue without giving up" 最後まで頑張り続けよう "Let's keep trying until the end" 夢を追い続けろ "Keep chasing your dreams" Encouraging language Motivational speeches Positive messaging

sections.heading: Common Collocations
sections.content: 走り続ける - keep running Very common 勉強し続ける - continue studying Common 待ち続ける - keep waiting Common 頑張り続ける - keep trying Motivational 愛し続ける - keep loving Romantic These are natural combinations Learn as units

sections.heading: Common Mistakes
sections.content: ❌ Using dictionary form ✗ 走る続ける ✓ Using stem form ✓ 走り続ける ❌ Overusing for simple ongoing Use ている for simple ongoing Use 続ける for emphasized persistence ✓ Match nuance to context ❌ Wrong conjugation ✗ 続けった ✓ Correct conjugation ✓ 続けた

children.heading: Real-life usage
children.content: 彼は20年間同じ仕事をし続けている "He has continued doing the same job for 20 years" 雨が3日間降り続けた "Rain kept falling for 3 days" 諦めずに挑戦し続けた結果、成功した "As a result of continuing to challenge without giving up, I succeeded" Natural contexts Everyday usage Emphasis on duration and persistence
